column1: Saint Pierre (French pronunciation: ​[sɛ̃.pjɛʁ]) is the third-largest commune in the French overseas department and region of Réunion. Located on the southwest side of the island
column2: it is the capital of the French Southern and Antarctic Lands.

column1: Pierrefonds Airport is located 5.5 kilometres outside of the commune. Opened in 1999
column2: this is a small airport for commercial traffic. It has an IATA code of ZSE.
